#summary How to get dependecies?
#labels Featured

=How to get dependecies?=
 * Use [http://poi.apache.org/download.html POI] distribution and [http://code.google.com/p/sqlsheet/downloads/list check downloads]
 * Compile sources with [http://maven.apache.org/download.html maven]
  # [http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads.html Chekout] [http://code.google.com/p/sqlsheet/source/checkout sources]
  # Compile
{{{
     mvn clean install
}}}
  # Go to ${sources}/target/libs
  # Grab jars

==Requirements for [http://code.google.com/p/sqlsheet/downloads/detail?name=sqlsheet-5.jar sqlsheet-5.jar]==
 * java5+
 * [http://code.google.com/p/sqlsheet/downloads/detail?name=jsqlparser-0.6.2.a.jar jsqlparser-0.6.2.a.jar]
 * [http://poi.apache.org/download.html Latest POI]

==Requirements for [http://code.google.com/p/sqlsheet/downloads/detail?name=sqlsheet-6.jar sqlsheet-6.jar]==
 * java6+
 * [http://code.google.com/p/sqlsheet/downloads/detail?name=jsqlparser-0.7.0.jar jsqlparser-0.7.0.jar]
 * [http://poi.apache.org/download.html Latest POI]


===Requirements for [http://poi.apache.org/download.html XLS]===
 * poi-3.8.jar

===Requirements for [http://poi.apache.org/download.html XLSX]===
 * poi-3.8.jar
 * dom4j-1.6.1.jar

 * poi-ooxml-schemas-3.8.jar
 * stax-api-1.0.1.jar
 * xmlbeans-2.3.0.jar
